course_title: Special Topics: Masterclass in Global Markets
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 6 / Seats Avail: 2Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes:
Professor Kirsten Travers-UyHam and Rebecca Ginzburg 94BBA, President and COO of Junto Capital Management LP will co-teach a Masterclass in Hedge Fund Investing.  This course will enable students to design their own strategy and operational framework for the launch of an investment fund, based on best market practices.  Teams will work together to research opportunities, pitch their ideas, and simulate the trading process and management of their own fund. The course will utilize professional trading products and platforms, allowing the students to experience how global events and news impact live market prices and fund performance over time.  This course is ideal for students who are planning careers in investment management, sales and trading or Fintech


A/D/S deadline is March 14
o	March 31, April 1 and 2 (class starting Thursday afternoon through Saturday afternoon) 
o	Thursday:  4-6pm (2 hours)  
o	Friday:  9am- 4pm, including teaching time as well as students' group work (7 hours)
o	Saturday:  9am-4pm, including teaching time as well as students' group work (7 hours)
